name: Jun Huang 0001
content: Jun Huang@CityU I am an Assistant Professor in Computer Science at City University of Hong Kong. Prior to joining CityU, I was a Research Scientist at MIT and an Assistant Professor at Peking University. I received my PhD in Computer Science and Engineering at Michigan State University. My research interests span across Wireless Networking, Mobile and Wearable Computing, and Artificial Intelligence of Things (AIoT). I am looking for PhD students and Research Assistants. Please contact me by email.
